title: Patching Speed PBE HAlp!!!
body: My Download Speed is over 200Mbps At the worse it Drops to a little over 50Mbs and my Pbe patcher is 200Kbps Im just a little confused as to why its so slow when on other apps like steam for example, it never dips below 5MBs and thats on a slow day. I just downloaded a steam game update at 31MBs during the patching to see if it was my internet. Halp

replies.body: The entire patching process isn't just downloading files from the patching servers, the first portion is reliant on your disk speed, so slow performance here (first 32%) can be caused by factors involving disk access. I recommend simply letting the patching process run for a while and not touching it until it finishes. If you run into errors while patching, let me know.
It takes very long my internet speed is 45mb/s but stil the download speed after the 32% is only 86KB/s and goes below that

Are you running into a specific error message, or is it just taking a while to patch? Keep in mind that your (home) network bandwidth of 45 Mbps is not the same bandwidth that other sites and services can allocate to you while patching or downloading files. The actual number you'll see will be determined by your own download bandwidth, the bandwidth allowed from the host, and other network factors in between.

If you aren't running into an error, let the patch run while you aren't using the computer so it can run uninterrupted. Please let me know if you run into any patching errors.
